text:
In the news item, “DMK-Congress not strong enough to dislodge AIADMK”, it has been reported PMK MP Anbunami Ramadoss as saying that the DMK could not seek to replace the AIADMK.

Dr. Anbumani stressed that that incumbent AIADMK also would be washed out in the 2016 Assembly polls as it was the most corrupt regime. “But the DMK-Congress combine cannot hope to win and the People’s Welfare Front (PWF) is an illusion,” he said.
title: Clarification
